Description: Textile fragment; torn strip of undyed linen cloth from a mummy-wrapping; some deterioration of edges due to contact with bitumen(?). Side edges and one end are torn, other end is cut. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.28 ends per 10mm and weft c.12 picks per 10mm.
Curator's comments: Probably from the same cloth as BM6550. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1993]
